message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm looking forward to hearing back from you.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $20000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12000. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $15000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more to you than $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $17000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value you place on it and the effort I put into acquiring it.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $17000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time I can only go up to $13500. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I understand your constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $13500. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $16000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the value you place on it and the effort I put into acquiring it.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $16000 is still not within my budget. I'm willing to make a final offer of $14000. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement, but I need to be honest with you, if we can't meet on this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $15000.
